content: hey crafters I thought it'd be fun to do
a video series based on the tomb of annihilation you know in that kind of
jungle area I'm gonna have some crafts dealing with that kind of stuff but this
first craft I'm bringing you is is so cool I'm so excited to show it to you
guys it's a the zombie t-rex from the module and I was inspired by that and I
am so happy with how it came out I can't wait to show you guys so let's at the
table and I'll show you how to make this super easy zombie a t-rex
[Applause]
first off I wanted a really nice t-rex model and here it is I found this on
Amazon and here's a closer look now I like it because it's really large and
intimidating but not too large that it would seem just impossible to be this
big right so I like it so I got my hot glue gun and you can find the link below
I really like this lip glue gun because of the long nozzle and that's what's key
in this project so I'm gonna fill in some areas on the t-rex there around the
ribs the mouth and I'm kind of dragging it like muscles right I'm trying to make
like muscle pattern on there and the key is just score a little bit of glue and
then kind of drag it with the metal nozzle and that's what's so great about
the metal nozzle so the same thing I'm gonna do it on the leg like the muscle
exposed on the leg there and the other key is don't put too much glue you know
it's better to start with a little and then add some so I'm going to do
something here on the mouth above the mouth you need there some Gore hanging
down from the teeth just kind of drag it down it so nice and I'll start doing the
ribs so I'll just pull beads of hot glue along where there's actually a rib cage
on it so it's easy to see where those would go and yeah there's another thing
I'll do the knee here on the belly cool I did a big chunk on
the tail there and now what I'm gonna do to accentuate the wound is kind of go
around it with hot glue and pull away pull outside the wound and it looks like
the flesh is ripped when you do that it's really hard to see with this clear
hot glue but once we paint it wow this is really gonna pop making that jaw
there some ripped flesh cool after I'd applied the glue I
noticed the foot was bent in a weird way so I wanted to fix that and I used my
heat gun to fix that you can check out my video for that and it shows you
exactly how to do that and that worked very well to fix that my next step was
to black bomb the t-rex and now you can start to see the details all popping out
right and really cool so I then painted it with a light gray just painted it
with Kraft acrylic paint and then I dry brushed it with a very light kind of
ivory and the ivory was really bringing out those details and really making it I
think look like a zombie t-rex oh this is where it really comes to life so to
speak the gore is really cool it really looks neat against the lightish flesh
right I just use like a cranberry and a bright red and kind of mix them while
they're wet and you get that kind of nice gore look I also paint the tongue
like kind of a sickly pink kind of a raspberry pink and then I just wash it a
little bit with the red right I then painted all the claws and teeth with an
ivory color and I picked out the ribs with the ivory color also and that gave
a really nice effect against the gore there and I added a little more gore on
the ribs to make it kind of like the meat sticking to the ribs one last thing
I did for the bone is I added a golden brown wash and that makes them kind of
looked aged and old right this step really helps bring out the detail when
you add a wash and I just use a black magic crafts technique he has a little
bit of dish soap to the wash and it helps it flow into the cracks because it
breaks down the adhesion of the water right and I did kind of a brownish a
little bit of brown black wash on it and it really pops the details
I wanted to add a few final details so I put stripes on it with a metallic black
and that gives it kind of a nice sheen on that I also did some areas with the
just a black wash I just took black paint and watered it down put it around
the eyes and kind of areas on the on the head to give it an interesting look last
couple of details I wanted to make the eyes look milky white so I painted them
white and then did kind of a gray pupil in there so I thought that really looked
good and for the last bit I added some water-based varnish to the t-rex and to
give those you know kind of ripped up areas like a gory wet look and that
really works well and you can check that on my links below the vid so let's go to
the table and take a look at this BC in some terrain well crafters that was a
bit scary but now let's take a look at this guy I am just so happy with this Oh
watch out Roderick and he'll gosh I'm so happy with this guy I just think for the
little amount of work we did on it it really looks impressive when you put
this down on the table people are gonna freak out you know and I'm gonna play
this to the hill you know make this thing my invincible so yeah very cool
check out the you know all the wounds open wounds and everything and I just
think the pale colour looks great and just the the gore you know that's the
wet gore and I really like the milky white I particularly in the darkened eye
socket so I hope you guys enjoy this craft and take care hey fellow crafters
I hope you liked the vid and if you did why not give me a like also check out
the links below I have affiliated links to all my crafting materials as well my
website that has recommendations and I get a small kickback from that that does
help me expand the channel and try out new materials and that kind of thing so
appreciate is no extra cost to you it just gives me a little bit of kickback
to support the channel and I appreciate that
another thing is I have my patreon if you want to go to that level and I have
a super secret Facebook group for those people that join the patreon I also have
extra content that I don't post on patreon for those members so consider
that if you would and check out my other vids and have fun crafting go forth and
craft and have fun gaming
